subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are closing in on a new contract for starter Mike Mussina, they traded outfielder Gary Sheffield to Detroit on Friday, and they sent starter Jaret Wright to Baltimore for reliever Chris Britton on Sunday.
snippet: The Yankees are closing in on a new contract for starter Mike Mussina, they traded outfielder Gary Sheffield to Detroit on Friday, and they sent starter Jaret Wright to Baltimore for reliever Chris Britton on Sunday.
